name.ja: <ruby>賢<rt>けん</rt></ruby><ruby>帝<rt>てい</rt></ruby><ruby>家<rt>か</rt></ruby><ruby>臣<rt>しん</rt></ruby>ツーゼ

requirement.en: During the turn you Normal Summoned this card, shuffle 2 monsters with 1000 DEF from your Graveyard into the Deck.

effect.en: Your opponent Sets 1 Spell Card from their Graveyard to their field. Then, you can add 1 Level 5 or higher monster with 1000 DEF from your Graveyard to your hand.
